import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { user } from '../models/user'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-list', templateUrl: './user-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-list.component.css'] }) export class UserListComponent implements OnInit { userList$: Observable; constructor(private userService: UserService) { } ngOnInit() { this.userList$=this.userService.getUser(); } }
